name: Le Temps du Thé
description:
After the disbandment of their founding unit, LightStart, All Right Entertainment wanted to keep up the momentum to ensure the future success of their company. Their existing units, Keys and Nightingale were quickly ascending the ranks of stardom, but their success rode greatly on their beginnings with LightStart. They needed a unit to be popular day one, and what better way to manufacture pre-debut popularity than an idol survival program!

Through this program, you'll guide seven girls, alongside their host, a former LightStart member, towards a chance to debut as a unit of five. By influencing their popularity through different outing locations and weekly video sessions and focusing on training different aspects, you have a hold on who stays and who goes.
